Vulois stares at Windrazor, jaw dropped. Avenge? With troops? No, 
that isn't the way.

"What do you want? To go in there, blasters open and slag them all? I 
don't think so. My way is peace. That is what Soundwave died for, and 
he would not want it to change. If we start war on the alliance, than 
peace can never be accomplished. If you really want to remember 
Soundwave's memory, as I do, since he was a great friend of mine, 
than help me win over the alliance. Come with me to their base, and 
amke Zardus listen to us. Not with troops. Just myself and you. And 
perhaps a thirs, because another one is coming soon. I don't know 
when, but I sent a message. But for now, come in and I will show you 
what my mission is about."
